fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The user's first name and surname

fields.name: activation_key
fields.description: The activation key for the account

fields.name: expiration_days
fields.description: The number of days before the activation key expires

fields.name: company
fields.description: The company the user is associated with

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country the user comes from

fields.name: state_province
fields.description: The state or province the user is located in

fields.name: user_id
fields.description: A unique ID identifying the user

fields.name: csp_attributes
fields.description: The cloud service provider's CSP attributes

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: The absolute path to where the file was uploaded
